description: 🧜‍♀️ A Sublime Text plugin to beautify and minify source code: CSS, SCSS, Sass, HTML, XML, SVG,JS,JavaScript, JSON, GraphQL, Markdown, TypeScript, Vue, Lua, YAML, Go, Perl, PHP, Python, Ruby, Rust, Haskell, Dart, Swift, Crystal, Bash, Shell, SQL, CSV, C, C++, C#, Objective-C, D, Java, Pawn, Julia, Proto, LaTeX, D2, Graphviz, Mermaid, PlantUML, etc
